name: Demon Within (philliptrudeau, Vader09, Michael Macapagal, Majiru)
name_original: Demon Within (philliptrudeau, Vader09, Michael Macapagal, Majiru)
description:
WASD/Arrows to move, and press Shift to dodge bullets.

Click to attack and build up Rage.

Press Space when your Rage meter is full to unleash the Demon Within.

Escape to pause, Alt-Enter for fullscreen.

Made for GMTK Jam 2020.
Cyborg Primate & Majiru - art & character design

Michael Macapagal & Eugenio Bruno - music & sound

Phillip Trudeau-Tavara - programming

SpiritBlue & Cainã Demezio (Vader09) - pixel art
